data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 9,369 believers in Jashpur, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jashpur, Chhattisgarh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Jashpur, Chhattisgarh, India.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Please, teach the 9,369 believers in Jashpur, Chhattisgarh, India how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 831,997 lost people in  Jashpur, Chhattisgarh, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Munnewar people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Munnewar people.
Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Jashpur, Chhattisgarh, India.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Jashpur that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.section_summary:
the county of Jashpur, Chhattisgarh, India has a population of 851,700.

We estimate Jashpur has 9,369 people who might know Jesus, 10,334 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 831,997 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Jashpur, Chhattisgarh, India to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
